titles.title: To amend title XX of the Social Security Act to repeal the program of block grants to States for social services, and for other purposes.
To amend title XX of the Social Security Act to repeal the program of block grants to States for social services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Repeals the program of block grants to states for social services under title XX (Block Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act.
